command: let {success, failure, label, source} = await foundry.applications.api.DialogV2.wait({ classes: ["sanity-macro"], position: { width: 500, height: 500 }, window: 'Sanity Roll Setup', content: ` `, buttons: [{ action: "ok", label: "Post", callback: (event, htmlBtn, dialog) => { let form = htmlBtn.closest('.dialog-form'); return { label: form.querySelector('input[name="label"]').value, success: form.querySelector('input[name="success"]').value, failure: form.querySelector('input[name="failure"]').value, source: form.querySelector('[name="source"]').value } } }, {action: "cancel", label: "Cancel", icon: "",}], default: "ok" }); if (!success.length || !failure.length) { return } if (source && source === 'no') { source = '' } else { source = `,source:${source}` } let content = `@Sanity[success:${success},failure:${failure}${source}]`; if (label) { content += `{${label}}` } ChatMessage.create({'content': content})
